name: You'll stay here forever
description:
You'll stay here forever is a first-person game in which you are a scout astronaut sent to the surface of the planet Proxima Centauri b, discovered on August 24, 2016, 4.2 light-years away from Earth. Your task is to find the lost rovers in the challenging local atmosphere, overcoming dangerous obstacles, solving puzzles and making unexpected discoveries.

Game Features:
  • Interesting story
  • Mysterious environment
  • Atmospheric music
